
Causal Reasoning Validation (CRV)
=================================

The CRV module provides tools for evaluating and visualizing the discovered causal graphs.

Main Class
----------

- `CRV <crv.CRV>`_

Functionalities
---------------

- **Edge Confidence Calculation**
- **Path Discovery**
- **Visualization using Cytoscape**

Classes
-------

- `CRV <crv.CRV>`_
- `CRVConfiguration <crv.CRVConfiguration>`_
